Ok, this has managed to get me curious. Can anyone (anyone at all) 
tell me just one instance when the Alliance broke a treaty violently. 
People claim that the Alliance is treacherous all the time, but just 
for fun, I'd like to see if anyone can think of a time when the 
Alliance broke a treaty by backstabbing or something.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Necromancer sneers at Shockaract aiming the tip of his gun at the 
tip 
> of the tanks gattling gun, "Iron Raptor trusts to easily." They 
were 
> close enough now for either one to hit the other. "I've seen to 
much 
> treachery from your kind to believe that a cease fire will ever be 
> honored. Now take your lackeys and leave or I WILL make sure that 
you 
> can't return to anywhere."
